ItemTooltips.tpscroll: Core on every hero. Do not get caught without a TP Scroll.
ItemTooltips.poor_mans_shield: Only get this if facing a lot of harrasment.
ItemTooltips.heart: Gives you a lot more survivability, usually this is needed by late game.
ItemTooltips.sphere: Decide between Radiance or Linkens Sphere depending on your early game farm rate and the enemys disables.
ItemTooltips.hood_of_defiance: If facing a lot of magic damage consider getting this.
ItemTooltips.rapier: Weaver is one of the best Divine Rapier holders, however if you are prone to dying do not get this.
ItemTooltips.monkey_king_bar: If the enemy gets evasion or if playing against Phantom Assassin, Brewmaster, etc.
ItemTooltips.radiance: Decide between Radiance or Linkens Sphere depending on your early game farm rate and the enemys disables.
ItemTooltips.desolator: Get Desolator if you can get it early, it is needed if your enemies are stacking armor (through items such as AC).

AbilityTooltips.weaver_the_swarm: You can use this to give vision to your team, scout for enemies, delay enemy creepwaves from advancing while you take down towers and more.
AbilityTooltips.weaver_shukuchi: This allows you to move at maximum speed and damages everyone you pass through. It has a short duration and cooldown. Spam this if your mana allows it.
AbilityTooltips.weaver_geminate_attack: A reliable damage boost. Use this to harrass your enemies when its off cooldown. Take note of the timer as it can offset your farming.
AbilityTooltips.weaver_time_lapse:
Take note of the timer and try to anticipate where you will return. It can be utilized in many different ways.

It dispells Dust and Track.

Note: If you buy back and use this it will return you to where you died.
